name: The dailly life of a GSE student
name_original: The dailly life of a GSE student
description:
The dailly life of a GSE student

Ever feld like that your life as a student is hinging on the amount of caffein you consume? Maybe you sometimes wish for an more effective form of caffein. Well in The dailly life of a GSE student you make a deal with Devilbert. He offers you the strongest coffee in metaverse, but at what cost?

Fight you way through hordes of other students by giving them the joy of coffee. Defeat the teachers in different ways and enjoy all their voice-overs! Experience the University grounds in a new and improved way! Don't forget to admire all the remodeling Devilbert has done!

The dailly life of a GSE student is a game created for the 6th winter game jame. The game jam's main theme is: "..., but at what cost?"

The game can be played within the browser using the wasd keys to move, the space bar to throw coffee and the mouse to continue dialog. Play with music on!

The team

Jey: The Code God
Elias: The OST Machine
Deniz: The Illusive Artist
Chris: The Omnipotent Foley Artist
Rover: The Almight Leven Designer

Special thanks

We would like to thank our teachers and fellow students who helped did the voice-overs for The dailly life of a GSE student!
